this_title: On Mothers and Daughters in Times of Injustice
introduction: Through old letters, Merle revisits her past as an anti-Apartheid activist, which fractured her relationship with her mother forever. At the same time, she faces her privilege in today’s South Africa and her relationship with her own daughter.源自：https://ccadiff.ukzn.ac.za/diff44/on-mothers-and-daughters-in-times-of-injustice/
